definition: to buy or upgrade a ticket after boarding a train, boat etc/to buy a ticket for a show after having sat down in the theater
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: Where am I supposed to pay the excess fare?
Sorry, your luggage is over weight , please buy a luggage ticket.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，你的行李已超重，請補票。

sentences.english: Please pay for the excess baggage at the opposite ticket counter.
sentences.chinese: 請到對面補票櫃檯交納逾重行李費。

sentences.english: Your alternative place has been confirmed. Please pick up your ticket at the ticket counter.
sentences.chinese: 您的候補已被確定，請到補票櫃檯交票款。

sentences.english: Because she also lost her tickets, she don't have money for the tickets.
sentences.chinese: 因爲她的錢包也丟了，沒有錢補票。

sentences.english: Previously, the passengers on the train ticket is lost, the need to pay for the replacement ticket.
sentences.chinese: 以前，乘客上車後票丟了，需要重新掏錢補票。

definition: soft sleeper (a type of sleeper train ticket class with a softer bunk)
